name: Moon Crest
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 20%
Increase magic damage against Reapers by 100%

name: Moon Crest
月輪之印
달의 인장
Symbole Lunaire
Mondwappen
Símbolo de la Luna
desc_short: Boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 20%, and boost magic damage against reapers
提高20%全屬性耐性+魔法攻擊時提高對死靈系魔物的傷害
모든 속성 저항력 20% 상승+마법공격 시 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량 상승
Augmente la rés. au feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres de 20% et augmente les dégâts magiques contre les morts-vivants
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht- und Dunkelresist. um 20% und mehr Schaden gegen Untote.
Aumenta la res. al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 20% y aumenta el daño mágico contra muertos vivientes
desc_long: Boosts fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance by 20%, and boosts magic damage against reapers.
提高20%全屬性耐性+魔法攻擊時提高對死靈系魔物的傷害
모든 속성 저항력이 20% 상승하고, 마법공격 시 사령형 마물에게 주는 피해량이 상승합니다.
Augmente la rés. au feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres de 20% et augmente les dégâts magiques contre les morts-vivants
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht- und Dunkelresist. um 20% und mehr Schaden gegen Untote.
Aumenta la resistencia al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz y oscuridad un 20% y aumenta el daño mágico contra muertos vivientes.
